page.title: 05A childs day in Fulford
page.content: After waking I washed,dressed then went downstairs.I ate my breakfast whilst watching television.After I went upstairs and brushed my hair and cleaned my teeth before Dad took me to school by car.At school we did Mathamatics until playtime followed by English until dinner.I stopped for packed lunch,then played on the school field until the start of afternoon lessons.We then studied the history of tea and continued with this topic all afternoon.After school I walked home in time to watch'Children's Hour' on the television.Later I practised on the piano and cello.After tea I went to York University to play cricket with my family.On our return I changed into my night clothes,then ate my supper whilst watching television. After supper I went upstairs,washed and cleaned my teeth.Then went to bed.
